Create FAQ item

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"question\": \"question\",
        \"answer\": \"answer\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "question": "question",
        "answer": "answer"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'question' => 'question',
                'answer' => 'answer',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Example: application/json

question   string    required  

Example: question

answer   string    required  

Example: answer

Update FAQ item

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 1,
        \"question\": \"question\",
        \"answer\": \"answer\",
        \"sortIndex\": 0
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "question": "question",
        "answer": "answer",
        "sortIndex": 0
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 1,
                'question' => 'question',
                'answer' => 'answer',
                'sortIndex' => 0,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update FAQ Items Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update-order"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/update-order';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'sortIndex' => 2,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
items   object[]    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

sortIndex   integer    required  

Example: 2

POST api/v3/faq/delete

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/faq/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    1,
                    2,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Feedback

Create Feedback

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/feedback/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"rating\": 5,
        \"content\": \"Best app ever!\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/feedback/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "rating": 5,
        "content": "Best app ever!"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/feedback/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'rating' => 5,
                'content' => 'Best app ever!',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/feedback/create'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "rating": 5,
        "content": "Best app ever!"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/feedback/create

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
rating   integer    required  

Example: 5

content   string    required  

Example: Best app ever!

Init

Get global list

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/globals" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/globals"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/globals';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/globals'
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/init/globals

Headers

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Get state list

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/state" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/state"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/init/state';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',

Option

Create Option

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"name\": \"Size\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "name": "Size"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'name' => 'Size',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update Option

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": \"1\",
        \"name\": \"Clothes\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": "1",
        "name": "Clothes"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => '1',
                'name' => 'Clothes',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Delete Option

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 1
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/option/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 1,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

    }

Order

Create Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"customerId\": null,
        \"customerDetails\": {
            \"name\": \"John Doe\",
            \"phoneNumber\": \"+44777777777\",
            \"email\": \"test@example.com\",
            \"country\": \"GB\",
            \"city\": \"Manchester\",
            \"state\": \"MAN\",
            \"zipPostal\": \"M4U678\",
            \"address\": \"Some str. 123\"
        },
        \"cart\": [
            {
                \"id\": null,
                \"quantity\": 1
            }
        ],
        \"cartDiscount\": {
            \"type\": \"cash\",
            \"value\": \"1\",
            \"reason\": \"cart discount\"
        },
        \"couponId\": null,
        \"deliveryOptionId\": null,
        \"salesChannel\": \"my_shop\",
        \"paymentId\": null,
        \"deliveryStatus\": \"open\",
        \"paymentStatus\": \"unpaid\",
        \"note\": \"test note\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "customerId": null,
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": null,
                "quantity": 1
            }
        ],
        "cartDiscount": {
            "type": "cash",
            "value": "1",
            "reason": "cart discount"
        },
        "couponId": null,
        "deliveryOptionId": null,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": null,
        "deliveryStatus": "open",
        "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
        "note": "test note"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'customerId' => null,
                'customerDetails' => [
                    'name' => 'John Doe',
                    'phoneNumber' => '+44777777777',
                    'email' => 'test@example.com',
                    'country' => 'GB',
                    'city' => 'Manchester',
                    'state' => 'MAN',
                    'zipPostal' => 'M4U678',
                    'address' => 'Some str. 123',
                ],
                'cart' => [
                    [
                        'id' => null,
                        'quantity' => 1,
                    ],
                ],
                'cartDiscount' => [
                    'type' => 'cash',
                    'value' => '1',
                    'reason' => 'cart discount',
                ],
                'couponId' => null,
                'deliveryOptionId' => null,
                'salesChannel' => 'my_shop',
                'paymentId' => null,
                'deliveryStatus' => 'open',
                'paymentStatus' => 'unpaid',
                'note' => 'test note',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/create'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "customerId": null,
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": null,
                "quantity": 1
            }
        ],
        "cartDiscount": {
            "type": "cash",
            "value": "1",
            "reason": "cart discount"
        },
        "couponId": null,
        "deliveryOptionId": null,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": null,
        "deliveryStatus": "open",
        "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
        "note": "test note"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

POST api/v3/order/create

Headers

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
customerId   integer  optional    
customerDetails   object  optional    
name   string  optional    

Example: John Doe

phoneNumber   string  optional    

Example: +44777777777

email   string  optional    

Example: test@example.com

country   string  optional    

Example: GB

city   string  optional    

Example: Manchester

state   string  optional    

Example: MAN

zipPostal   string  optional    

Example: M4U678

address   string  optional    

Example: Some str. 123

cart   object    required  
id   integer    required  
quantity   integer    required  

Example: 1

cartDiscount   object  optional    
type   string  optional    

Example: cash

value   string  optional    

Example: 1

reason   string  optional    

Example: cart discount

couponId   integer  optional    
deliveryOptionId   integer  optional    
salesChannel   string    required  

Example: my_shop

paymentId   integer  optional    
deliveryStatus   string    required  

Example: open

paymentStatus   string    required  

Example: unpaid

note   string  optional    

Example: test note

Update Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 1,
        \"updateCart\": false,
        \"customerId\": 1,
        \"customerDetails\": {
            \"name\": \"John Doe\",
            \"phoneNumber\": \"+44777777777\",
            \"email\": \"test@example.com\",
            \"country\": \"GB\",
            \"city\": \"Manchester\",
            \"state\": \"MAN\",
            \"zipPostal\": \"M4U678\",
            \"address\": \"Some str. 123\"
        },
        \"cart\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"quantity\": 1
            }
        ],
        \"cartDiscount\": {
            \"type\": \"cash\",
            \"value\": \"5\",
            \"reason\": \"cart discount\"
        },
        \"couponId\": 1,
        \"deliveryOptionId\": 1,
        \"salesChannel\": \"my_shop\",
        \"paymentId\": 1,
        \"deliveryStatus\": \"open\",
        \"paymentStatus\": \"unpaid\",
        \"note\": \"test note\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "updateCart": false,
        "customerId": 1,
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "quantity": 1
            }
        ],
        "cartDiscount": {
            "type": "cash",
            "value": "5",
            "reason": "cart discount"
        },
        "couponId": 1,
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "deliveryStatus": "open",
        "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
        "note": "test note"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 1,
                'updateCart' => false,
                'customerId' => 1,
                'customerDetails' => [
                    'name' => 'John Doe',
                    'phoneNumber' => '+44777777777',
                    'email' => 'test@example.com',
                    'country' => 'GB',
                    'city' => 'Manchester',
                    'state' => 'MAN',
                    'zipPostal' => 'M4U678',
                    'address' => 'Some str. 123',
                ],
                'cart' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'quantity' => 1,
                    ],
                ],
                'cartDiscount' => [
                    'type' => 'cash',
                    'value' => '5',
                    'reason' => 'cart discount',
                ],
                'couponId' => 1,
                'deliveryOptionId' => 1,
                'salesChannel' => 'my_shop',
                'paymentId' => 1,
                'deliveryStatus' => 'open',
                'paymentStatus' => 'unpaid',
                'note' => 'test note',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "updateCart": false,
        "customerId": 1,
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "quantity": 1
            }
        ],
        "cartDiscount": {
            "type": "cash",
            "value": "5",
            "reason": "cart discount"
        },
        "couponId": 1,
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "deliveryStatus": "open",
        "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
        "note": "test note"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Request      

POST api/v3/order/update

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

updateCart   boolean  optional    

Example: false

customerId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

customerDetails   object  optional    
name   string  optional    

Example: John Doe

phoneNumber   string  optional    

Example: +44777777777

email   string  optional    

Example: test@example.com

country   string  optional    

Example: GB

city   string  optional    

Example: Manchester

state   string  optional    

Example: MAN

zipPostal   string  optional    

Example: M4U678

address   string  optional    

Example: Some str. 123

cart   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

quantity   integer    required  

Example: 1

cartDiscount   object  optional    
type   string  optional    

Example: cash

value   string  optional    

Example: 5

reason   string  optional    

Example: cart discount

couponId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

deliveryOptionId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

salesChannel   string    required  

Example: my_shop

paymentId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

deliveryStatus   string    required  

Example: open

paymentStatus   string    required  

Example: unpaid

note   string  optional    

Example: test note

Get Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get?id=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get"
);

const params = {
    "id": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'id' => '1',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get'
params = {
  'id': '1',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/order/get

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

id   integer    required  

The ID of the Order. Example: 1

Get Orders List

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 10,
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"aut\",
            \"paymentStatus\": \"unpaid\",
            \"deliveryStatuses\": \"open\",
            \"salesChannels\": \"my_shop\",
            \"customerId\": 0,
            \"startDate\": \"\\\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\\\"\",
            \"endDate\": \"\\\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\\\"\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "aut",
            "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
            "deliveryStatuses": "open",
            "salesChannels": "my_shop",
            "customerId": 0,
            "startDate": "\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\"",
            "endDate": "\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\""
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 10,
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => 'aut',
                    'paymentStatus' => 'unpaid',
                    'deliveryStatuses' => 'open',
                    'salesChannels' => 'my_shop',
                    'customerId' => 0,
                    'startDate' => '"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z"',
                    'endDate' => '"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z"',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "aut",
            "paymentStatus": "unpaid",
            "deliveryStatuses": "open",
            "salesChannels": "my_shop",
            "customerId": 0,
            "startDate": "\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\"",
            "endDate": "\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\""
        }
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/order/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
page   integer  optional    

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 10

filter   object  optional    
searchTerm   string.  optional    

Can be specified customer's full_name, phone_number, email, country, city, state, zip_postal, address Example: aut

paymentStatus   strings[]  optional    

Example: unpaid

deliveryStatuses   strings[]  optional    

Example: open

salesChannels   strings[]  optional    

Example: my_shop

customerId   integer  optional    

Example: 0

startDate   string  optional    

Example: "2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z"

endDate   string  optional    

Example: "2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z"

Delete Orders

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    1,
                    2,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/delete'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

POST api/v3/order/delete

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
items   integer[]    required  

Get Order Payment Details

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-payment-details" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"orderId\": 1,
        \"cart\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"quantity\": 1
            }
        ],
        \"cartDiscount\": {
            \"type\": \"cash\",
            \"value\": \"5\",
            \"reason\": \"cart discount\"
        },
        \"couponId\": 1,
        \"deliveryOptionId\": 1
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-payment-details"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "orderId": 1,
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "quantity": 1
            }
        ],
        "cartDiscount": {
            "type": "cash",
            "value": "5",
            "reason": "cart discount"
        },
        "couponId": 1,
        "deliveryOptionId": 1
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/get-payment-details';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'orderId' => 1,
                'cart' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'quantity' => 1,
                    ],
                ],
                'cartDiscount' => [
                    'type' => 'cash',
                    'value' => '5',
                    'reason' => 'cart discount',
                ],
                'couponId' => 1,
                'deliveryOptionId' => 1,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update External Order Delivery Status

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update-external-delivery-status" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"orderId\": 1,
        \"deliveryService\": \"shiip\",
        \"deliveryStatus\": \"booked\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update-external-delivery-status"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "orderId": 1,
        "deliveryService": "shiip",
        "deliveryStatus": "booked"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/order/update-external-delivery-status';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'orderId' => 1,
                'deliveryService' => 'shiip',
                'deliveryStatus' => 'booked',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Example: 1

Example: shiip

deliveryStatus   string  optional    

Example: booked

Page

Create Page

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"isVisible\": false,
        \"name\": \"name page\",
        \"description\": \"description\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "isVisible": false,
        "name": "name page",
        "description": "description"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'isVisible' => false,
                'name' => 'name page',
                'description' => 'description',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

payload = {
    "data": {
        "isVisible": false,
        "name": "name page",
        "description": "description"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
isVisible   boolean    required  

Example: false

name   string    required  

Example: name page

description   string  optional    

nullable Example: description

Update Page

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"isVisible\": true,
        \"id\": 10,
        \"name\": \"name page\",
        \"type\": \"custom\",
        \"description\": \"description\",
        \"sortIndex\": 1
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "isVisible": true,
        "id": 10,
        "name": "name page",
        "type": "custom",
        "description": "description",
        "sortIndex": 1
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'isVisible' => true,
                'id' => 10,
                'name' => 'name page',
                'type' => 'custom',
                'description' => 'description',
                'sortIndex' => 1,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Example: 1

Delete Page

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    1,
                    2,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/delete'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
items   integer[]    required  

Get Page

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get?id=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get"
);

const params = {
    "id": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'id' => '1',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get'
params = {
  'id': '1',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example: 1

Get all Pages

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3,
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"\\\"\\\"\"
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"\""
        },
        "sort": "name:asc"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => '""',
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

    "data": {

        "pageSize": 3,

            "searchTerm": "\"\""
        },
        "sort": "name:asc"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Example: application/json

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required

Example: 1

Example: 3

Example: name:asc

Update Pages Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update-order"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/update-order';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'sortIndex' => 2,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

requires authentication

    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/page/1/update-visibility"

Payment

Get Payment

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/get?id=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/get"
);

const params = {
    "id": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'id' => '1',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update Payment

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 1,
        \"name\": \"Cash\",
        \"description\": \"Only Cash\",
        \"type\": \"custom\",
        \"connected\": true,
        \"sortIndex\": 0,
        \"config\": {
            \"secretKey\": \"sk_test_d29a70d7b4d9672d3e207c67aaa3\"
        },
        \"image\": \"cashImage.img\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Cash",
        "description": "Only Cash",
        "type": "custom",
        "connected": true,
        "sortIndex": 0,
        "config": {
            "secretKey": "sk_test_d29a70d7b4d9672d3e207c67aaa3"
        },
        "image": "cashImage.img"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 1,
                'name' => 'Cash',
                'description' => 'Only Cash',
                'type' => 'custom',
                'connected' => true,
                'sortIndex' => 0,
                'config' => [
                    'secretKey' => 'sk_test_d29a70d7b4d9672d3e207c67aaa3',
                ],
                'image' => 'cashImage.img',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Request      

POST api/v3/payment/update

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

name   string    required  

Example: Cash

description   string  optional    

optional Example: Only Cash

type   string    required  

Example: custom

connected   boolean    required  

Example: true

sortIndex   integer    required  

Example: 0

config   object  optional    
secretKey   string  optional    

Parameter for paystack type only. Example: sk_test_d29a70d7b4d9672d3e207c67aaa3

image   string    required  

Example: cashImage.img

Update Payments Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update-order"
);

                "id": 1,

        ]
    }

Update Payments Status

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update-status" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"isActive\": true
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/payment/update-status"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "isActive": true
            }
        ]
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'isActive' => true,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Plugin

Get all Plugins

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Get Plugin

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get/reviews" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get/reviews"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/get/reviews';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update Plugin Status

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-status" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"0\": [],
        \"type\": \"reviews\",
        \"status\": \"inactive\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-status"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "0": [],
        "type": "reviews",
        "status": "inactive"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-status';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                [],
                'type' => 'reviews',
                'status' => 'inactive',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-status'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "0": [],
        "type": "reviews",
        "status": "inactive"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

[type:chat_widget] Update Plugin

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-type--chat-widget" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"type\": \"chat_widget\",
        \"settings\": {
            \"display\": null,
            \"customize\": {
                \"position\": \"bottomLeft\",
                \"iconSize\": \"medium\",
                \"iconColor\": null
            },
            \"channels\": [
                {
                    \"type\": \"whatsapp\",
                    \"value\": \"some_wa_link\"
                }
            ]
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-type--chat-widget"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "type": "chat_widget",
        "settings": {
            "display": null,
            "customize": {
                "position": "bottomLeft",
                "iconSize": "medium",
                "iconColor": null
            },
            "channels": [
                {
                    "type": "whatsapp",
                    "value": "some_wa_link"
                }
            ]
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-type--chat-widget';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'type' => 'chat_widget',
                'settings' => [
                    'display' => null,
                    'customize' => [
                        'position' => 'bottomLeft',
                        'iconSize' => 'medium',
                        'iconColor' => null,
                    ],
                    'channels' => [
                        [
                            'type' => 'whatsapp',
                            'value' => 'some_wa_link',
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

    --header "Accept: application/json" \

    \"data\": {
        \"type\": \"google_search_console\",
        \"settings\": {
            \"id\": null
        }
    }
}"

[type:seo_settings] Update Plugin

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-type--seo-settings" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"type\": \"seo_settings\",
        \"settings\": {
            \"product\": {
                \"metaTitle\": null,
                \"metaDescription\": null
            },
            \"collection\": {
                \"metaTitle\": null,
                \"metaDescription\": null
            },
            \"homePage\": {
                \"metaTitle\": null,
                \"metaDescription\": null
            }
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/plugin/update-type--seo-settings"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "data": {
        "type": "seo_settings",
        "settings": {
            "product": {
                "metaTitle": null,
                "metaDescription": null
            },
            "collection": {
                "metaTitle": null,
                "metaDescription": null
            },
            "homePage": {
                "metaTitle": null,
                "metaDescription": null
            }
        }
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'type' => 'seo_settings',
                'settings' => [
                    'product' => [
                        'metaTitle' => null,
                        'metaDescription' => null,
                    ],
                    'collection' => [
                        'metaTitle' => null,
                        'metaDescription' => null,
                    ],
                    'homePage' => [
                        'metaTitle' => null,
                        'metaDescription' => null,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
