Product

Create product

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"collectionId\": null,
        \"brandId\": 1,
        \"name\": \"product_name\",
        \"description\": \"description\",
        \"unlimited\": true,
        \"variations\": [
            {
                \"availability\": true,
                \"price\": \"1.23\",
                \"weight\": \"1.00\",
                \"quantity\": 1,
                \"images\": [
                    [
                        \"path\\/image.jpg\"
                    ]
                ],
                \"options\": [
                    {
                        \"id\": null,
                        \"name\": null,
                        \"value\": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "collectionId": null,
        "brandId": 1,
        "name": "product_name",
        "description": "description",
        "unlimited": true,
        "variations": [
            {
                "availability": true,
                "price": "1.23",
                "weight": "1.00",
                "quantity": 1,
                "images": [
                    [
                        "path\/image.jpg"
                    ]
                ],
                "options": [
                    {
                        "id": null,
                        "name": null,
                        "value": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'collectionId' => null,
                'brandId' => 1,
                'name' => 'product_name',
                'description' => 'description',
                'unlimited' => true,
                'variations' => [
                    [
                        'availability' => true,
                        'price' => '1.23',
                        'weight' => '1.00',
                        'quantity' => 1,
                        'images' => [
                            [
                                'path/image.jpg',
                            ],
                        ],
                        'options' => [
                            [
                                'id' => null,
                                'name' => null,
                                'value' => null,
                            ],
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/create'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "collectionId": null,
        "brandId": 1,
        "name": "product_name",
        "description": "description",
        "unlimited": true,
        "variations": [
            {
                "availability": true,
                "price": "1.23",
                "weight": "1.00",
                "quantity": 1,
                "images": [
                    [
                        "path\/image.jpg"
                    ]
                ],
                "options": [
                    {
                        "id": null,
                        "name": null,
                        "value": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (400, Service is unhealthy):


{
    "status": "down",
    "services": {
        "database": "up",
        "redis": "down"
    }
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/product/create

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
collectionId   integer  optional    
brandId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

name   string    required  

Example: product_name

description   string    required  

Example: description

unlimited   boolean    required  

Default is true. Example: true

variations   object[]    required  
availability   boolean    required  

Default is true. Example: true

price   string    required  

Example: 1.23

weight   string  optional    

(in kilos) Example: 1.00

quantity   integer    required  

Example: 1

images[]   string[]  optional    
options   object[]    required  
id   integer  optional    
name   string  optional    
value   string  optional    

Update product

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 1,
        \"collectionId\": null,
        \"brandId\": 1,
        \"name\": \"product_name\",
        \"description\": \"description\",
        \"unlimited\": true,
        \"published\": true,
        \"variations\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"availability\": true,
                \"price\": \"1.23\",
                \"weight\": \"1.0\",
                \"quantity\": 1,
                \"images\": [
                    [
                        \"path\\/image.jpg\"
                    ]
                ],
                \"options\": [
                    {
                        \"id\": null,
                        \"name\": null,
                        \"value\": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "collectionId": null,
        "brandId": 1,
        "name": "product_name",
        "description": "description",
        "unlimited": true,
        "published": true,
        "variations": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "availability": true,
                "price": "1.23",
                "weight": "1.0",
                "quantity": 1,
                "images": [
                    [
                        "path\/image.jpg"
                    ]
                ],
                "options": [
                    {
                        "id": null,
                        "name": null,
                        "value": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 1,
                'collectionId' => null,
                'brandId' => 1,
                'name' => 'product_name',
                'description' => 'description',
                'unlimited' => true,
                'published' => true,
                'variations' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'availability' => true,
                        'price' => '1.23',
                        'weight' => '1.0',
                        'quantity' => 1,
                        'images' => [
                            [
                                'path/image.jpg',
                            ],
                        ],
                        'options' => [
                            [
                                'id' => null,
                                'name' => null,
                                'value' => null,
                            ],
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "collectionId": null,
        "brandId": 1,
        "name": "product_name",
        "description": "description",
        "unlimited": true,
        "published": true,
        "variations": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "availability": true,
                "price": "1.23",
                "weight": "1.0",
                "quantity": 1,
                "images": [
                    [
                        "path\/image.jpg"
                    ]
                ],
                "options": [
                    {
                        "id": null,
                        "name": null,
                        "value": null
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/product/update

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

collectionId   integer  optional    
brandId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

name   string    required  

Example: product_name

description   string  optional    

Example: description

unlimited   boolean    required  

Example: true

published   boolean    required  

Example: true

variations   object[]    required  
id   integer  optional    

Example: 1

availability   boolean    required  

Default is true. Example: true

price   string    required  

Example: 1.23

weight   string  optional    

(in kilos) Example: 1.0

quantity   integer    required  

Example: 1

images[]   string[]  optional    
options   object[]    required  
id   integer  optional    
name   string  optional    
value   string  optional    

Get all Products Ids

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-ids-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"Apple\",
            \"collectionIdList\": null,
            \"brandIdList\": null,
            \"inStock\": true,
            \"isBlocked\": false
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-ids-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "Apple",
            "collectionIdList": null,
            "brandIdList": null,
            "inStock": true,
            "isBlocked": false
        },
        "sort": "name:asc"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-ids-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => 'Apple',
                    'collectionIdList' => null,
                    'brandIdList' => null,
                    'inStock' => true,
                    'isBlocked' => false,
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

            "searchTerm": "Apple",

    }

Example: Apple

brandIdList   integer[]  optional

Example: true

Example: false

sort   string  optional    

Example: name:asc

Get all Products

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"Apple\",
            \"collectionIdList\": null,
            \"brandIdList\": null,
            \"inStock\": true,
            \"isBlocked\": false
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\",
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "Apple",
            "collectionIdList": null,
            "brandIdList": null,
            "inStock": true,
            "isBlocked": false
        },
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get-list';

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => 'Apple',
                    'collectionIdList' => null,
                    'brandIdList' => null,
                    'inStock' => true,
                    'isBlocked' => false,
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Delete Products

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    1,
                    2,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

            2

Update Products Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update-order"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/update-order';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'sortIndex' => 2,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Get Product

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get?id=1&slug=Apple" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get"
);

const params = {
    "id": "1",
    "slug": "Apple",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'id' => '1',
            'slug' => 'Apple',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product/get'
params = {
  'id': '1',
  'slug': 'Apple',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/product/get

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

id   integer    required  

The ID of the product. Example: 1

slug   string    required  

The slug of the product. Example: Apple

Product Entry

Get all Products entries list

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 10,
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\",
        \"filter\": {
            \"collectionId\": 1,
            \"productId\": 1,
            \"searchTerm\": \"Test\",
            \"idList\": [],
            \"discountId\": 1,
            \"couponId\": 1
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "filter": {
            "collectionId": 1,
            "productId": 1,
            "searchTerm": "Test",
            "idList": [],
            "discountId": 1,
            "couponId": 1
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 10,
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
                'filter' => [
                    'collectionId' => 1,
                    'productId' => 1,
                    'searchTerm' => 'Test',
                    'idList' => [],
                    'discountId' => 1,
                    'couponId' => 1,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10,
        "sort": "name:asc",

            "collectionId": 1,
            "productId": 1,

            "idList": [],
            "discountId": 1,
            "couponId": 1
        }
    }

Request      

POST api/v3/product-entries/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required

Content-Type       required

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 10

sort   string  optional    

Example: name:asc

filter   object  optional    
collectionId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

productId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: Test

idList   integer[]  optional    
discountId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

couponId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

Get all Products entries Ids

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-ids-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\",
        \"filter\": {
            \"collectionId\": 1,
            \"productId\": 1,
            \"searchTerm\": \"Test\",
            \"inStock\": true,
            \"idList\": [],
            \"discountId\": 1,
            \"couponId\": 1
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-ids-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "filter": {
            "collectionId": 1,
            "productId": 1,
            "searchTerm": "Test",
            "inStock": true,
            "idList": [],
            "discountId": 1,
            "couponId": 1
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-ids-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
                'filter' => [
                    'collectionId' => 1,
                    'productId' => 1,
                    'searchTerm' => 'Test',
                    'inStock' => true,
                    'idList' => [],
                    'discountId' => 1,
                    'couponId' => 1,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/product-entries/get-ids-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "filter": {
            "collectionId": 1,
            "productId": 1,
            "searchTerm": "Test",
            "inStock": true,
            "idList": [],
            "discountId": 1,
            "couponId": 1
        }
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/product-entries/get-ids-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
sort   string  optional    

Example: name:asc

filter   object  optional    
collectionId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

productId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: Test

inStock   boolean  optional    

Example: true

idList   string[]  optional    
discountId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

couponId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

Promo

Get all Promos

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/promo/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"\\\"\\\"\",
            \"type\": [
                \"discount\"
            ],
            \"endDate\": \"\\\"2023-01-05T14:48:00.000Z\\\"\",
            \"startDate\": \"\\\"2023-10-05T14:48:00.000Z\\\"\"
        },
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 10
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/promo/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"\"",
            "type": [
                "discount"
            ],
            "endDate": "\"2023-01-05T14:48:00.000Z\"",
            "startDate": "\"2023-10-05T14:48:00.000Z\""
        },
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/promo/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => '""',
                    'type' => [
                        'discount',
                    ],
                    'endDate' => '"2023-01-05T14:48:00.000Z"',
                    'startDate' => '"2023-10-05T14:48:00.000Z"',
                ],
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 10,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/promo/get-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"\"",
            "type": [
                "discount"
            ],
            "endDate": "\"2023-01-05T14:48:00.000Z\"",
            "startDate": "\"2023-10-05T14:48:00.000Z\""
        },
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 10
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

POST api/v3/promo/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
filter   object  optional    
searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: ""

type   string[]  optional    
endDate   string  optional    

Example: "2023-01-05T14:48:00.000Z"

startDate   string  optional    

Example: "2023-10-05T14:48:00.000Z"

page   integer  optional    

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 10

Shop

Get Auth Code

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/code" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/code"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/code';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

[type:theme] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--theme" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"theme\": {
            \"btnColor\": \"#000000\",
            \"bgImage\": \"some img\",
            \"bgColor\": \"#F2F4F7\",
            \"useBgImage\": true,
            \"fontSize\": 16,
            \"bgImageOpacity\": 0,
            \"adultPopup\": false,
            \"adultPopupTitle\": \"Warning! Adult content!\",
            \"adultPopupDescription\": \"You must be older than 18 years old to watch our stuff\",
            \"cookiePopup\": true,
            \"favicon\": \"https:\\/\\/static.alephexpress.com\\/api\\/file\\/get\\/default\\/logo-shop.svg\",
            \"headingFont\": \"Roboto\",
            \"paragraphFont\": \"Roboto\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--theme"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "theme": {
            "btnColor": "#000000",
            "bgImage": "some img",
            "bgColor": "#F2F4F7",
            "useBgImage": true,
            "fontSize": 16,
            "bgImageOpacity": 0,
            "adultPopup": false,
            "adultPopupTitle": "Warning! Adult content!",
            "adultPopupDescription": "You must be older than 18 years old to watch our stuff",
            "cookiePopup": true,
            "favicon": "https:\/\/static.alephexpress.com\/api\/file\/get\/default\/logo-shop.svg",
            "headingFont": "Roboto",
            "paragraphFont": "Roboto"
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--theme';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'theme' => [
                    'btnColor' => '#000000',
                    'bgImage' => 'some img',
                    'bgColor' => '#F2F4F7',
                    'useBgImage' => true,
                    'fontSize' => 16,
                    'bgImageOpacity' => 0.0,
                    'adultPopup' => false,
                    'adultPopupTitle' => 'Warning! Adult content!',
                    'adultPopupDescription' => 'You must be older than 18 years old to watch our stuff',
                    'cookiePopup' => true,
                    'favicon' => 'https://static.alephexpress.com/api/file/get/default/logo-shop.svg',
                    'headingFont' => 'Roboto',
                    'paragraphFont' => 'Roboto',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Example: 0

Example: false

[type:header] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--header" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"header\": {
            \"bgColor\": \"#FFFFFF\",
            \"logoSize\": 2,
            \"logoFont\": \"Montserrat\",
            \"logoFontColor\": \"#000000\",
            \"logoImageUrl\": \"https:\\/\\/static.alephexpress.com\\/api\\/file\\/get\\/default\\/logo-shop.svg\",
            \"logoTextValue\": \"Shop Brand\",
            \"searchDisplayMode\": \"icon\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--header"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "header": {
            "bgColor": "#FFFFFF",
            "logoSize": 2,
            "logoFont": "Montserrat",
            "logoFontColor": "#000000",
            "logoImageUrl": "https:\/\/static.alephexpress.com\/api\/file\/get\/default\/logo-shop.svg",
            "logoTextValue": "Shop Brand",
            "searchDisplayMode": "icon"
        }
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,

        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',

            'data' => [
                'header' => [
                    'bgColor' => '#FFFFFF',

                    'searchDisplayMode' => 'icon',

            ],
        ],
    ]
);

[type:mainProducts] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--mainProducts" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"mainProducts\": {
            \"bgColor\": \"#FFFFFF\",
            \"title\": \"Popular Products\",
            \"collectionId\": null,
            \"slider\": false,
            \"aspectRatio\": \"3:4\",
            \"oneClick\": false
        }
    }
}"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--mainProducts"
);

    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",

            "bgColor": "#FFFFFF",

            "oneClick": false
        }
    }

                    'oneClick' => false,
                ],
            ],

);

[type:mainCollections] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--mainCollections" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"mainCollections\": {
            \"bgColor\": \"transparent\",
            \"slider\": false,
            \"aspectRatio\": \"3:4\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--mainCollections"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "mainCollections": {
            "bgColor": "transparent",
            "slider": false,
            "aspectRatio": "3:4"
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--mainCollections';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'mainCollections' => [
                    'bgColor' => 'transparent',
                    'slider' => false,
                    'aspectRatio' => '3:4',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

[type:homeSections] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--homeSections" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"homeSections\": {
            \"items\": [
                {
                    \"type\": \"slider\",
                    \"sortable\": false,
                    \"active\": true
                }
            ]
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--homeSections"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "homeSections": {
            "items": [
                {
                    "type": "slider",
                    "sortable": false,
                    "active": true
                }
            ]
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--homeSections';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'homeSections' => [
                    'items' => [
                        [
                            'type' => 'slider',
                            'sortable' => false,
                            'active' => true,
                        ],
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

[type:slider] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--slider" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"slider\": {
            \"bgColor\": \"#FFFFFF\",
            \"stretchedImage\": false
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--slider"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    "data": {
        "slider": {
            "bgColor": "#FFFFFF",
            "stretchedImage": false
        }
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'slider' => [
                    'bgColor' => '#FFFFFF',
                    'stretchedImage' => false,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

[type:textAndImage] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--textAndImage" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"textAndImage\": {
            \"image\": null,
            \"title\": null,
            \"description\": null,
            \"imagePosition\": \"left\",
            \"bgColor\": \"#F2F4F7\"
        }
    }
}"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--textAndImage"

        \"mainVideo\": {
            \"youTubeUrl\": null,
            \"title\": null,
            \"description\": null,
            \"videoPosition\": \"center\",
            \"bgColor\": \"#F2F4F7\"

    }

[type:catalogSection] Update shop config

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--catalogSection" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"catalogSection\": {
            \"aspectRatio\": \"3:4\",
            \"useBorders\": false,
            \"displayMode\": \"smallTiles\",
            \"showAddToCard\": false,
            \"stretchedImage\": true
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/update-config-type--catalogSection"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "catalogSection": {
            "aspectRatio": "3:4",
            "useBorders": false,
            "displayMode": "smallTiles",
            "showAddToCard": false,
            "stretchedImage": true
        }
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'catalogSection' => [
                    'aspectRatio' => '3:4',
                    'useBorders' => false,
                    'displayMode' => 'smallTiles',
                    'showAddToCard' => false,
                    'stretchedImage' => true,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Get shop configuration

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/config" \
    --header "Uuid: possimus" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/config"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "possimus",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/config';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'possimus',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Uuid': 'possimus',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

    --header "Uuid: aperiam" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/get-main-products"
);

    "Uuid": "aperiam",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,

        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'aperiam',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);

Get Products list

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"Apple\",
            \"collectionIdList\": null
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\",
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "Apple",
            "collectionIdList": null
        },
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => 'Apple',
                    'collectionIdList' => null,
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "Apple",
            "collectionIdList": null
        },
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/shop/product/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
filter   object  optional    
searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: Apple

collectionIdList   string[]  optional    
sort   string  optional    

Example: name:asc

page   integer  optional    

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 3

Get related products by slug

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-related-list/quam" \
    --header "Uuid: corrupti" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-related-list/quam"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "corrupti",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-related-list/quam';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'corrupti',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-related-list/quam'
headers = {
  'Uuid': 'corrupti',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/shop/product/get-related-list/{slug}

Headers

Uuid       required  

Example: corrupti

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

slug   string    required  

Example: quam

Get Product Entries

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-entries" \
    --header "Uuid: repellendus" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"idList\": null
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-entries"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "repellendus",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "idList": null
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-entries';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'repellendus',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'idList' => null,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get-entries'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "idList": null
    }
}
headers = {
  'Uuid': 'repellendus',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/shop/product/get-entries

Headers

Uuid       required  

Example: repellendus

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
idList   integer[]    required  

Get all Slides

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/slide/get-list" \
    --header "Uuid: voluptate" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/slide/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "voluptate",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/slide/get-list';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'voluptate',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Shop state

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/state" \
    --header "Uuid: 123-345-445" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/state"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "123-345-445",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => '123-345-445',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/plugin/get-list"

    ]

Create Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Uuid: hic" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"customerDetails\": {
            \"name\": \"John Doe\",
            \"phoneNumber\": \"+44777777777\",
            \"email\": \"test@example.com\",
            \"country\": \"GB\",
            \"city\": \"Manchester\",
            \"state\": \"MAN\",
            \"zipPostal\": \"M4U678\",
            \"address\": \"Some str. 123\"
        },
        \"cart\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"name\": \"Product name\",
                \"amount\": 1,
                \"price\": \"100.00\",
                \"weight\": \"1.00\"
            }
        ],
        \"coupon\": \"SALE\",
        \"deliveryOptionId\": 1,
        \"salesChannel\": \"my_shop\",
        \"paymentId\": 1,
        \"isOneClick\": true,
        \"note\": \"test note\",
        \"rate\": [
            []
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Uuid": "hic",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Product name",
                "amount": 1,
                "price": "100.00",
                "weight": "1.00"
            }
        ],
        "coupon": "SALE",
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "isOneClick": true,
        "note": "test note",
        "rate": [
            []
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Uuid' => 'hic',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'customerDetails' => [
                    'name' => 'John Doe',
                    'phoneNumber' => '+44777777777',
                    'email' => 'test@example.com',
                    'country' => 'GB',
                    'city' => 'Manchester',
                    'state' => 'MAN',
                    'zipPostal' => 'M4U678',
                    'address' => 'Some str. 123',
                ],
                'cart' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'name' => 'Product name',
                        'amount' => 1,
                        'price' => '100.00',
                        'weight' => '1.00',
                    ],
                ],
                'coupon' => 'SALE',
                'deliveryOptionId' => 1,
                'salesChannel' => 'my_shop',
                'paymentId' => 1,
                'isOneClick' => true,
                'note' => 'test note',
                'rate' => [
                    [],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/create'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "customerDetails": {
            "name": "John Doe",
            "phoneNumber": "+44777777777",
            "email": "test@example.com",
            "country": "GB",
            "city": "Manchester",
            "state": "MAN",
            "zipPostal": "M4U678",
            "address": "Some str. 123"
        },
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Product name",
                "amount": 1,
                "price": "100.00",
                "weight": "1.00"
            }
        ],
        "coupon": "SALE",
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "isOneClick": true,
        "note": "test note",
        "rate": [
            []
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Uuid': 'hic',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/shop/order/create

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Uuid       required  

Example: hic

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
customerDetails   object  optional    
name   string  optional    

Example: John Doe

phoneNumber   string  optional    

Example: +44777777777

email   string  optional    

nullable Example: test@example.com

country   string  optional    

nullable Example: GB

city   string  optional    

nullable Example: Manchester

state   string  optional    

nullable Example: MAN

zipPostal   string  optional    

nullable Example: M4U678

address   string  optional    

nullable Example: Some str. 123

cart   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

name   string    required  

Example: Product name

amount   integer    required  

Example: 1

price   string    required  

Example: 100.00

weight   string  optional    

nullable Example: 1.00

coupon   string  optional    

nullable Example: SALE

deliveryOptionId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

salesChannel   string    required  

Example: my_shop

paymentId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

isOneClick   boolean  optional    

Example: true

note   string  optional    

Example: test note

rate[]   object  optional    

nullable

rate   object  optional    
jwt   string  optional    

nullable Example: qui

name   string  optional    

nullable Example: eius

estimatedDays   string  optional    

nullable Example: hic

amount   integer  optional    

nullable Example: 5

Get full product information by slug

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get/cupiditate" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get/cupiditate"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/product/get/cupiditate';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Get Order Payment Details

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/calculate" \
    --header "Uuid: cumque" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"cart\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"name\": \"Product name\",
                \"amount\": 1,
                \"price\": \"100.00\",
                \"weight\": \"1.00\"
            }
        ],
        \"coupon\": \"SALE\",
        \"deliveryOptionId\": 1,
        \"salesChannel\": \"my_shop\",
        \"paymentId\": 1,
        \"rate\": [
            []
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/calculate"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "cumque",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Product name",
                "amount": 1,
                "price": "100.00",
                "weight": "1.00"
            }
        ],
        "coupon": "SALE",
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "rate": [
            []
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/calculate';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'cumque',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'cart' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'name' => 'Product name',
                        'amount' => 1,
                        'price' => '100.00',
                        'weight' => '1.00',
                    ],
                ],
                'coupon' => 'SALE',
                'deliveryOptionId' => 1,
                'salesChannel' => 'my_shop',
                'paymentId' => 1,
                'rate' => [
                    [],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/order/calculate'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "cart": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Product name",
                "amount": 1,
                "price": "100.00",
                "weight": "1.00"
            }
        ],
        "coupon": "SALE",
        "deliveryOptionId": 1,
        "salesChannel": "my_shop",
        "paymentId": 1,
        "rate": [
            []
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Uuid': 'cumque',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/shop/order/calculate

Headers

Uuid       required  

Example: cumque

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
cart   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

name   string    required  

Example: Product name

amount   integer    required  

Example: 1

price   string    required  

Example: 100.00

weight   string  optional    

nullable Example: 1.00

coupon   string  optional    

nullable Example: SALE

deliveryOptionId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

salesChannel   string    required  

Example: my_shop

paymentId   integer  optional    

Example: 1

rate[]   object  optional    

nullable

rate   object  optional    
jwt   string  optional    

nullable Example: magni

name   string  optional    

nullable Example: hic

estimatedDays   string  optional    

nullable Example: quia

amount   integer  optional    

nullable Example: 5

Get Page by slug

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/page/get/test" \
    --header "Uuid: aut" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/page/get/test"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "aut",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/page/get/test';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'aut',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/page/get/test'
headers = {
  'Uuid': 'aut',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/shop/page/get/{slug}

Headers

Uuid       required  

Example: aut

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

slug   string    required  

Example: test

Email order unsubscribe

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/email/unsubscribe" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Uuid: numquam" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"token\": \"jwt_token\",
        \"types\": [
            \"order\"
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/email/unsubscribe"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Uuid": "numquam",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "token": "jwt_token",
        "types": [
            "order"
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/email/unsubscribe';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Uuid' => 'numquam',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'token' => 'jwt_token',
                'types' => [
                    'order',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/email/unsubscribe'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "token": "jwt_token",
        "types": [
            "order"
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Uuid': 'numquam',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/shop/email/unsubscribe

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Uuid       required  

Example: numquam

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
token   string    required  

Example: jwt_token

types   object    required  
0   string    required  

Example: order

Get all FAQ items

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/faq/get-list" \
    --header "Uuid: omnis" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/faq/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "omnis",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/faq/get-list';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'omnis',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Uuid': 'omnis',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

Get Sitemap

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/sitemap/get" \
    --header "Uuid: quas" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"type\": \"index\",
        \"page\": 1
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/sitemap/get"
);

const headers = {
    "Uuid": "quas",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "type": "index",
        "page": 1
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/sitemap/get';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Uuid' => 'quas',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'type' => 'index',
                'page' => 1,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

payload = {
    "data": {
        "type": "index",
        "page": 1
    }
}

  'Uuid': 'quas',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

Request failed with error:

You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example: index

Example: 1

Get store uuid by domain

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/uuid" \
    --header "Domain: neque" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/uuid"
);

const headers = {
    "Domain": "neque",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/uuid';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Domain' => 'neque',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

Get Access Token

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/token" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"code\": \"e1231b4702922bc874a6972b212ef0d6f564b390\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/token"
);

const headers = {
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "code": "e1231b4702922bc874a6972b212ef0d6f564b390"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/shop/auth/token';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'code' => 'e1231b4702922bc874a6972b212ef0d6f564b390',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

    }

  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}
