Slide

Create Slide

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"isVisible\": true,
        \"title\": \"name slide\",
        \"description\": \"description\",
        \"useBgImage\": false,
        \"bgImage\": \"img.jpg\",
        \"bgImageOpacity\": 0.5,
        \"bgColor\": \"#000000\",
        \"fontColor\": \"#000000\",
        \"sortIndex\": 0,
        \"useLink\": true,
        \"linkObjectType\": \"product|collection|page\",
        \"linkObjectId\": 17,
        \"linkObjectName\": \"laudantium\",
        \"linkObjectSlug\": \"placeat\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "isVisible": true,
        "title": "name slide",
        "description": "description",
        "useBgImage": false,
        "bgImage": "img.jpg",
        "bgImageOpacity": 0.5,
        "bgColor": "#000000",
        "fontColor": "#000000",
        "sortIndex": 0,
        "useLink": true,
        "linkObjectType": "product|collection|page",
        "linkObjectId": 17,
        "linkObjectName": "laudantium",
        "linkObjectSlug": "placeat"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'isVisible' => true,
                'title' => 'name slide',
                'description' => 'description',
                'useBgImage' => false,
                'bgImage' => 'img.jpg',
                'bgImageOpacity' => 0.5,
                'bgColor' => '#000000',
                'fontColor' => '#000000',
                'sortIndex' => 0,
                'useLink' => true,
                'linkObjectType' => 'product|collection|page',
                'linkObjectId' => 17,
                'linkObjectName' => 'laudantium',
                'linkObjectSlug' => 'placeat',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/create'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "isVisible": true,
        "title": "name slide",
        "description": "description",
        "useBgImage": false,
        "bgImage": "img.jpg",
        "bgImageOpacity": 0.5,
        "bgColor": "#000000",
        "fontColor": "#000000",
        "sortIndex": 0,
        "useLink": true,
        "linkObjectType": "product|collection|page",
        "linkObjectId": 17,
        "linkObjectName": "laudantium",
        "linkObjectSlug": "placeat"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/slide/create

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
isVisible   boolean    required  

Example: true

title   string    required  

Example: name slide

description   string  optional    

Example: description

useBgImage   boolean    required  

Example: false

bgImage   string  optional    

Example: img.jpg

bgImageOpacity   number  optional    

Example: 0.5

bgColor   string  optional    

Example: #000000

fontColor   string  optional    

Example: #000000

sortIndex   integer    required  

Example: 0

useLink   boolean    required  

Example: true

linkObjectType   string    required  

Example: product|collection|page

linkObjectId   integer    required  

Example: 17

linkObjectName   string    required  

Example: laudantium

linkObjectSlug   string    required  

Example: placeat

Update Slide

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 3,
        \"isVisible\": false,
        \"title\": \"name slide\",
        \"description\": \"description\",
        \"useBgImage\": true,
        \"bgImage\": \"img.jpg\",
        \"bgImageOpacity\": 0.5,
        \"bgColor\": \"#000000\",
        \"fontColor\": \"#000000\",
        \"sortIndex\": 0,
        \"useLink\": true,
        \"linkObjectType\": \"product|collection\",
        \"linkObjectId\": 8,
        \"linkObjectName\": \"aut\",
        \"linkObjectSlug\": \"asperiores\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 3,
        "isVisible": false,
        "title": "name slide",
        "description": "description",
        "useBgImage": true,
        "bgImage": "img.jpg",
        "bgImageOpacity": 0.5,
        "bgColor": "#000000",
        "fontColor": "#000000",
        "sortIndex": 0,
        "useLink": true,
        "linkObjectType": "product|collection",
        "linkObjectId": 8,
        "linkObjectName": "aut",
        "linkObjectSlug": "asperiores"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 3,
                'isVisible' => false,
                'title' => 'name slide',
                'description' => 'description',
                'useBgImage' => true,
                'bgImage' => 'img.jpg',
                'bgImageOpacity' => 0.5,
                'bgColor' => '#000000',
                'fontColor' => '#000000',
                'sortIndex' => 0,
                'useLink' => true,
                'linkObjectType' => 'product|collection',
                'linkObjectId' => 8,
                'linkObjectName' => 'aut',
                'linkObjectSlug' => 'asperiores',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

payload = {
    "data": {
        "id": 3,
        "isVisible": false,
        "title": "name slide",
        "description": "description",
        "useBgImage": true,
        "bgImage": "img.jpg",
        "bgImageOpacity": 0.5,
        "bgColor": "#000000",
        "fontColor": "#000000",
        "sortIndex": 0,
        "useLink": true,
        "linkObjectType": "product|collection",
        "linkObjectId": 8,
        "linkObjectName": "aut",
        "linkObjectSlug": "asperiores"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 3

isVisible   boolean    required  

Example: false

Example: name slide

description   string  optional    

Example: description

Example: true

Example: img.jpg

Example: 0.5

Example: #000000

Example: 0

Example: true

Example: asperiores

Delete slides with list of id

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/delete" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/delete"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/delete';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    1,
                    2,
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/delete'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            1,
            2
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/slide/delete

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
items   integer[]    required  

Get all Slides

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3,
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"\\\"\\\"\"
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"\""
        },
        "sort": "name:asc"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => '""',
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/get-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"\""
        },
        "sort": "name:asc"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/slide/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
page   integer  optional    

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 3

filter   object  optional    
searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: ""

sort   string  optional    

Example: name:asc

Update Slides Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update-order"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update-order';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'sortIndex' => 2,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/slide/update-order'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/slide/update-order

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
items   object[]    required  
id   integer    required  

Example: 1

sortIndex   integer    required  

Example: 2

Store

Get country settings list

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/country-settings" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/country-settings"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/country-settings';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

GET api/v3/store/country-settings

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Check if user's Store exists

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/exists" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/exists"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/exists';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Get store details

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/details" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/details"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/details';

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);

print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Unpublish store

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/unpublish" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/unpublish"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/unpublish';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);

Get language list

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/languages" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/languages"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/languages';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Update store settings

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-settings" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"shopLanguageCode\": \"BD-en\",
        \"currency\": \"USD\",
        \"timezoneId\": 1
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-settings"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "shopLanguageCode": "BD-en",
        "currency": "USD",
        "timezoneId": 1
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-settings';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'shopLanguageCode' => 'BD-en',
                'currency' => 'USD',
                'timezoneId' => 1,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-settings'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "shopLanguageCode": "BD-en",
        "currency": "USD",
        "timezoneId": 1
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/store/update-settings

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
shopLanguageCode   string    required  

Example: BD-en

currency   string    required  

Example: USD

timezoneId   integer    required  

Example: 1

Change Own Domain

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/own" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"domain\": \"purrli.com\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/own"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "domain": "purrli.com"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/own';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'domain' => 'purrli.com',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

    "data": {
        "domain": "purrli.com"
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

data   object    required  
domain   string    required  

Example: purrli.com

Check Sub Domain

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/sub" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"domain\": \"subdomainname\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/sub"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "domain": "subdomainname"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/sub';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'domain' => 'subdomainname',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

    "data": {
        "domain": "subdomainname"
    }

Check Own Domain

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/own" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"domain\": \"purrli.com\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/own"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "domain": "purrli.com"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/own';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'domain' => 'purrli.com',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/check/own'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "domain": "purrli.com"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Cancel Domain change

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/cancel" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/cancel"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/cancel';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/info"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [

Update info

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-info" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"name\": \"My store\",
        \"description\": \"My first store\",
        \"contacts\": [
            {
                \"type\": \"phone, email, messenger, whatsapp, telegram\",
                \"value\": \"email@email.com\",
                \"sortIndex\": 1
            }
        ],
        \"useBusinessAddress\": true,
        \"country\": \"US\",
        \"zipPostal\": \"123456789\",
        \"city\": \"NY\",
        \"state\": \"NY state\",
        \"address\": \"Address\",
        \"socialLinks\": [
            {
                \"type\": \"facebook, instagram, youtube, tiktok, snapchat, pinterest\",
                \"value\": \"https:\\/\\/www.instagram.com\\/my_store\\/\",
                \"sortIndex\": 8
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-info"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "name": "My store",
        "description": "My first store",
        "contacts": [
            {
                "type": "phone, email, messenger, whatsapp, telegram",
                "value": "email@email.com",
                "sortIndex": 1
            }
        ],
        "useBusinessAddress": true,
        "country": "US",
        "zipPostal": "123456789",
        "city": "NY",
        "state": "NY state",
        "address": "Address",
        "socialLinks": [
            {
                "type": "facebook, instagram, youtube, tiktok, snapchat, pinterest",
                "value": "https:\/\/www.instagram.com\/my_store\/",
                "sortIndex": 8
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-info';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'name' => 'My store',
                'description' => 'My first store',
                'contacts' => [
                    [
                        'type' => 'phone, email, messenger, whatsapp, telegram',
                        'value' => 'email@email.com',
                        'sortIndex' => 1,
                    ],
                ],
                'useBusinessAddress' => true,
                'country' => 'US',
                'zipPostal' => '123456789',
                'city' => 'NY',
                'state' => 'NY state',
                'address' => 'Address',
                'socialLinks' => [
                    [
                        'type' => 'facebook, instagram, youtube, tiktok, snapchat, pinterest',
                        'value' => 'https://www.instagram.com/my_store/',
                        'sortIndex' => 8,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-info'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "name": "My store",
        "description": "My first store",
        "contacts": [
            {
                "type": "phone, email, messenger, whatsapp, telegram",
                "value": "email@email.com",
                "sortIndex": 1
            }
        ],
        "useBusinessAddress": true,
        "country": "US",
        "zipPostal": "123456789",
        "city": "NY",
        "state": "NY state",
        "address": "Address",
        "socialLinks": [
            {
                "type": "facebook, instagram, youtube, tiktok, snapchat, pinterest",
                "value": "https:\/\/www.instagram.com\/my_store\/",
                "sortIndex": 8
            }
        ]
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/store/update-info

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
name   string  optional    

optional Example: My store

description   string  optional    

optional Example: My first store

contacts   object[]    required  
type   string  optional    

Example: phone, email, messenger, whatsapp, telegram

value   string  optional    

Example: email@email.com

sortIndex   integer  optional    

Example: 1

useBusinessAddress   boolean    required  

Example: true

country   optional  optional    

string Example: US

zipPostal   optional  optional    

string Example: 123456789

city   optional  optional    

string Example: NY

state   optional  optional    

string Example: NY state

address   optional  optional    

string Example: Address

socialLinks   object[]    required  
type   string  optional    

Example: facebook, instagram, youtube, tiktok, snapchat, pinterest

value   string  optional    

Example: https://www.instagram.com/my_store/

sortIndex   integer  optional    

Example: 8

Update Contacts Order

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-contacts-order" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"items\": [
            {
                \"id\": 1,
                \"sortIndex\": 2
            }
        ]
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-contacts-order"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/update-contacts-order';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'items' => [
                    [
                        'id' => 1,
                        'sortIndex' => 2,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

            {
                "id": 1,
                "sortIndex": 2
            }
        ]
    }

  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

Accept       required

Example: 1

Example: 2

Get analytics

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/analytics/get" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"filter\": {
            \"startDate\": \"\\\"2023-03-05T14:48:00.000Z\\\"\",
            \"endDate\": \"\\\"2023-05-05T14:48:00.000Z\\\"\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/analytics/get"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "filter": {
            "startDate": "\"2023-03-05T14:48:00.000Z\"",
            "endDate": "\"2023-05-05T14:48:00.000Z\""
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/analytics/get';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'filter' => [
                    'startDate' => '"2023-03-05T14:48:00.000Z"',
                    'endDate' => '"2023-05-05T14:48:00.000Z"',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

        }
    }

Update onboarding

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/onboarding/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"productCreated\": true,
        \"paymentMethodAdded\": true,
        \"deliveryMethodCreated\": false,
        \"storePublished\": false,
        \"messagingStarted\": false,
        \"advertisingStarted\": false
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/onboarding/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "productCreated": true,
        "paymentMethodAdded": true,
        "deliveryMethodCreated": false,
        "storePublished": false,
        "messagingStarted": false,
        "advertisingStarted": false
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/onboarding/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'productCreated' => true,
                'paymentMethodAdded' => true,
                'deliveryMethodCreated' => false,
                'storePublished' => false,
                'messagingStarted' => false,
                'advertisingStarted' => false,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Change Sub Domain

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/sub" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"domain\": \"subdomainname\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/sub"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "domain": "subdomainname"
    }
};

    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/domain/change/sub';

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'domain' => 'subdomainname',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Get all Stores (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3,
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"\\\"aleph\\\"\",
            \"status\": [
                \"active\"
            ],
            \"toReview\": [
                0,
                1
            ],
            \"advertisingStatus\": [
                \"launched\",
                \"no_launched\"
            ],
            \"startUpdatedAt\": \"\\\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\\\"\",
            \"endUpdatedAt\": \"\\\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\\\"\"
        }
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"aleph\"",
            "status": [
                "active"
            ],
            "toReview": [
                0,
                1
            ],
            "advertisingStatus": [
                "launched",
                "no_launched"
            ],
            "startUpdatedAt": "\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\"",
            "endUpdatedAt": "\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\""
        }
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => '"aleph"',
                    'status' => [
                        'active',
                    ],
                    'toReview' => [
                        0,
                        1,
                    ],
                    'advertisingStatus' => [
                        'launched',
                        'no_launched',
                    ],
                    'startUpdatedAt' => '"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z"',
                    'endUpdatedAt' => '"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z"',
                ],
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get-list'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3,
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "\"aleph\"",
            "status": [
                "active"
            ],
            "toReview": [
                0,
                1
            ],
            "advertisingStatus": [
                "launched",
                "no_launched"
            ],
            "startUpdatedAt": "\"2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z\"",
            "endUpdatedAt": "\"2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z\""
        }
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/store/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
page   integer  optional    

Example: 1

pageSize   integer  optional    

Example: 3

filter   object  optional    
searchTerm   string  optional    

Example: "aleph"

status   strings[]  optional    
toReview   integer[]  optional    
advertisingStatus   string[]  optional    
startUpdatedAt   string  optional    

Example: "2023-06-14T15:32:55.000Z"

endUpdatedAt   string  optional    

Example: "2023-06-15T09:12:14.000Z"

Change Review Store status (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-review-status" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"uuid\": \"00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0\",
        \"toReview\": 0
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-review-status"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0",
        "toReview": 0
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-review-status';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'uuid' => '00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0',
                'toReview' => 0,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-review-status'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0",
        "toReview": 0
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:

POST api/v3/store/change-review-status

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
uuid   required  optional    

The UUID of the owner uuid. Example: 00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0

toReview   integer    required  

Example: 0

Change Store status (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-status" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"uuid\": \"00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0\",
        \"status\": \"blocked\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-status"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0",
        "status": "blocked"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/change-status';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'uuid' => '00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0',
                'status' => 'blocked',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

    "data": {

    }

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'

Request      

POST api/v3/store/change-status

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
uuid   required  optional    

The UUID of the owner uuid. Example: 00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0

status   string    required  

Example: blocked

Get Store (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get?uuid=00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get"
);

const params = {
    "uuid": "00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'uuid' => '00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/get'
params = {
  'uuid': '00a4319c-4edd-4f5b-bfef-8b1ae24339e0',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:

Get all Store Products (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"uuid\": \"4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4\",
        \"filter\": {
            \"searchTerm\": \"Apple\"
        },
        \"sort\": \"name:asc\",
        \"page\": 1,
        \"pageSize\": 3
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4",
        "filter": {
            "searchTerm": "Apple"
        },
        "sort": "name:asc",
        "page": 1,
        "pageSize": 3
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/get-list';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'uuid' => '4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4',
                'filter' => [
                    'searchTerm' => 'Apple',
                ],
                'sort' => 'name:asc',
                'page' => 1,
                'pageSize' => 3,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Block Store Product (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/block" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"uuid\": \"4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4\",
        \"productId\": 123
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/block"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4",
        "productId": 123
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/block';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'uuid' => '4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4',
                'productId' => 123,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Unblock Store Product (need backoffice permissions)

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/unblock" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"uuid\": \"4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4\",
        \"productId\": 123
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/unblock"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "uuid": "4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4",
        "productId": 123
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/store/product/unblock';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'uuid' => '4b384d0e-e2e9-4251-87b9-713fa73742c4',
                'productId' => 123,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Tax

Get Tax

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/get" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/get"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/get';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

Update Tax

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"active\": true,
        \"priceInclude\": true,
        \"tax\": \"4.5\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "active": true,
        "priceInclude": true,
        "tax": "4.5"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'active' => true,
                'priceInclude' => true,
                'tax' => '4.5',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/tax/update'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "active": true,
        "priceInclude": true,
        "tax": "4.5"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/v3/tax/update

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

data   object    required  
active   boolean    required  

Example: true

priceInclude   boolean    required  

Example: true

tax   string  optional    

Example: 4.5

Theme

Get all Themes

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/get-list" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/get-list"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/get-list';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/get-list'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/v3/theme/get-list

Headers

Authorization       required  

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}

Content-Type       required  

Example: application/json

Accept       required  

Example: application/json

Apply Theme

requires authentication

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/apply" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"data\": {
        \"id\": 7
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/apply"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "data": {
        "id": 7
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/apply';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'data' => [
                'id' => 7,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://store-api.express.test/api/v3/theme/apply'
payload = {
    "data": {
        "id": 7
    }
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_KEY}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Request failed with error:

Example: application/json

Example: application/json
